CHAT.comment: Book Reading; The Very Hungry Caterpillar

MOT and Chi sit on the floor and seem very relaxed. Chi holds book as Mot looks on. Notes say Chi uses fingers (to point to words). At first Chi is reading <in her brain> but Mot says she has to read out loud. Chi is a fluent if not a perfect reader. Mot encourages Chi to try again when Chi pronounces tiny as teeny. Birds are chirping happily (and mercifully quietly) in the background.

u.a: MOT and Chi look at each other
Chi and Mot both roll eyes
looks to Mot for encouragement before corrects
